title: RecommendationEdgePatch
description: LLM-proposed edge intent for cold-start recommendations.

edge_type.description: Canonical relationship type. In v1, all relationship types are symmetric.

from_id.description: Product ID endpoint A. Use canonical ordering: from_id <= to_id.

to_id.description: Product ID endpoint B. Use canonical ordering: from_id <= to_id.

notes.description: Short rationale for this edge. Null if self-evident.
